titleStmt.title: The principal acts of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland conveened at Edinburgh, January 11. 1698 / collected and extracted from the records, by the clerk thereof.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.

notesStmt.note: Title vignette: a burning bush within a circle, with caption, "Nec tamen consumebatur", signed, Ja. Clark sculp.
This item is fifth in a group of eight items bound and filmed together, at reel 733:37e.
Reproduction of originals in: Henry E. Huntington LIbrary and Art Gallery (reel 733:37e) and British Library (reel 1683:60).
